list.title: API
list.description: The base URL for the Philippine address API.

list.title: CACHE_TTL
list.description: Cache Time-To-Live in milliseconds (default is 1 hour).

list.title: barangays
list.description: Returns a promise resolving to the barangays data for a given city code.

list.title: barangaysCache
list.description: Cache for barangays data, keyed by "barangays-" + cityCode.

list.title: cities
list.description: Returns a promise resolving to the cities data for a given province code.

list.title: citiesCache
list.description: Cache for cities data, keyed by "cities-" + provCode.

list.title: constructAddress
list.description: Constructs a full address string from an object with the address parts.The object should have properties: region, province, city, barangay.

list.title: loadBarangays
list.description: Fetches barangay data for a given city code from the API, using in-memory caching with TTL.

list.title: loadCities
list.description: Fetches cities data for a given province code from the API, using in-memory caching with TTL.

list.title: loadProvinces
list.description: Fetches province data for a given region code from the API, using in-memory caching with TTL.

list.title: loadRegions
list.description: Fetches region data from the API, using in-memory caching with TTL.

list.title: provinces
list.description: Returns a promise resolving to the provinces data for a given region code.

list.title: provincesCache
list.description: Cache for provinces data, keyed by "provinces-" + regionCode.

list.title: regions
list.description: Returns a promise resolving to the regions data.
